column2: Changes the scale of single entity units. Does not apply to entities mounted on vehicles.
Increase the force of impacts and detonations to send entities flying further away.
Reduce reload times to increase ranged unit damage per second.
Increase the effect radius of abilities.
Increase unit base leadership to make units less likely to rout.
Increase the distance that a projectile can penetrate entities.
Modify the amount of damage caused to entities.
Reduce the vigour cost of actions to keep units fresh for longer.
Increase the amount of blood emitted by entities.
Increase the availability of the Winds of Magic for spellcasting
Increase unit size and single-entity health. Beware that large unit sizes can greatly reduce performance.
Increase the duration it takes for charge bonus to fade out.
Modify the effect of gravity on entities knocked flying.
Increase size of explosions and Vortex spells.
